Class AccountApi

java.lang.Object
com.amilesend.tmdb.client.api.ApiBase
com.amilesend.tmdb.client.api.AccountApi
public class AccountApi extends ApiBase
Defines APIs to access user account information. Note: A valid session must be authenticated and obtained. This can be done via the SessionManager.
See Also:
  • SessionManager
